thread.title: Sequoia Capital Goes on Fundraising Spree

author: Yuliya Chernova
title: Sequoia Capital Goes on Fundraising Spree
text:
One of Silicon Valley’s best-known venture-capital firms, Sequoia Capital, is pulling out the stops as it seeks to restock its war chest.
If it reaches its fundraising goals, the storied firm will collect more than $12 billion in capital to fund its ambitions in the U.S., China and other countries, according to a person familiar with Sequoia’s plans.
